dt: {bc}any of numerous small freshwater American cyprinid fishes (especially genus {it}Notropis{/it}) {dx}compare {dxt|golden shiner||}{/dx}

shortdef: a silvery fish; especially : any of numerous small freshwater American cyprinid fishes (especially genus Notropis)

dt: {bc}a small common cyprinid fish ({it}Notemigonus crysoleucas{/it}) of eastern North America having silvery sides with bright golden reflections and often used as bait

shortdef: a small common cyprinid fish (Notemigonus crysoleucas) of eastern North America having silvery sides with bright golden reflections and often used as bait
